About Devchat

Devchat was created by a team of ambitious university students with a passion for building tools that make software development more collaborative and efficient. We understand the challenges of managing code, communication, and progress in one place, so we built Devchat to bring everything together in a unified platform.

From late-night coding sessions to pitch presentations, this project reflects our commitment to solving real-world developer pain points—starting with student teams just like ours.

© 2025 Devchat. Built by students, for engineers.
